NAME had a terrible bedside manner due to HIS abrasiveness. HECAP often bullied HIS patients into getting cosmetic surgery. HECAP made a lot of money this way.
While very studious and careful in HIS work, HE never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

Philosopher26.title: Філософ
Philosopher26.desc:
NAME was a student on a glitterworld. HECAP had a hard time in school, since the other kids thought HIM rather strange.
HECAP always maintained a distance from these events, being continuously surprised by the many interesting and awkward ways life can go.

UprightDiplomat83.title: Чесний дипломат
UprightDiplomat83.desc:
As a diplomat, NAME was assigned to deal with diplomatic tasks in the blood-soaked outer rim sectors.
HECAP hoped to end the endless wars, until HIS consularship, the St. Anthem, was attacked by a raider fleet.

CaveChild67.title: Печерна дитина
CaveChild67.desc:
NAME grew up in a cave on an tundra planet, and was adopted by a traveling group of entertainers known only as the Wizards. Once a starfaring crew, the Wizards told HIM wondrous stories about the universe.
One day, the Wizards did not return from scavenging. After years of waiting, NAME set off into space to find them.

VideoProducer97.title: Відеопродюсер
VideoProducer97.desc:
Too awkward to socialize, NAME found comfort in the production of videos. Oddly, people enjoyed his videos, calling them "perfect sitcom dramas".
NAME took advantage of this and broadcast more, ever hopeful that HE would be contacted by the Wizards.

RangerChild91.title: Дитя-лісник
RangerChild91.desc:
NAME was raised in a forest. HISCAP father taught HIM to hunt and live off the land, so that HE could live without the need of others when father died.
Accustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, NAME could survive weeks alone.

BushSniper97.title: Снайпер-лісник
BushSniper97.desc:
NAME's peaceful life was cut short when HIS country was brutally invaded.
NAME was drafted into service as soon as HE was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. HECAP spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

GlitterworldRoyal5.title: Glitterworld royal
GlitterworldRoyal5.desc:
NAME grew up in a glitterworld royal household. She was groomed from a young age to marry into another planet's royal family.
Unfortunately, her crooked teeth made her undesirable to suitors, so she became bitter and resentful.

PirateSympathizer24.title: Pirate sympathizer
PirateSympathizer24.desc:
From her youth, NAME developed connections in the underworld. There she trained in melee combat and became a trusted underworld advisor.
After participating in a failed rebellion, she fled her homeworld to travel with a pirate band.

PlagueSurvivor48.title: Plague survivor
PlagueSurvivor48.desc:
NAME watched as a mysterious plague spread through his town, killing his family and friends.
HECAP learned some medicine from watching the plague doctors, but was mentally scarred by the ordeal.

UnethicalDoctor97.title: Unethical doctor
UnethicalDoctor97.desc:
NAME became a doctor to save lives and research medicine. HECAP soon realized the only way to make progress on HIS research was to perform experiments on human patients.
HECAP often used patients for HIS experiments - whether they were willing or not.

OffworldRecruit22.title: Offworld recruit
OffworldRecruit22.desc:
NAME was born an raised in an offworld soldier growth facility. From a very young age, HE was taught close-quarters combat tactics, aggression, and how to survive on distant planets.
One of the best, NAME was eventually chose to enter the orbital-deployment shock troop corps.

ShockTrooper52.title: Ударний десантник
ShockTrooper52.desc:
NAME was in a deep space shock troop unit deployed on multiple planets in various wars.
During a risky assault, HIS whole unit was wiped out. Nobody else knew what happened on the field that day, but NAME will carry the burden forever.

ProdigalStudent39.title: Студент-геній
ProdigalStudent39.desc:
NAME was a faithful student, and was dedicated to learning anything and everything he could about humanity and its creations.
While HE was shunned as a nerd, HE didn't mind. HECAP hoped for a brighter future.

CombatMedtech40.title: Бойовий медтех
CombatMedtech40.desc:
As a military medtech, NAME's job was to fix and build anything he could get HIS hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.
Sent into dangerous areas, HE never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

AnimalCaretaker27.title: Доглядач тварин
AnimalCaretaker27.desc:
Born on a medieval farm, NAME was tasked with caring for domestic animals. HECAP grew to love them.
With time, HE learned to tame wild animals. HECAP dreamed of one day meeting a thrumbo and taming it.

WildlifeRanger47.title: Лісник дикої природи
WildlifeRanger47.desc:
Dismayed at the poachers driving several animal species to near-extinction, NAME became a wildlife ranger. HECAP cared for and protect the animals - by force if necessary.
HECAP grew to hate people slaughtering animals for luxury and profit.

AdventurousYouth32.title: Авантюрна молодь
AdventurousYouth32.desc:
NAME explored all around HIS family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.
During his teenage years, NAME made numerous enemies

TreasureHunter70.title: Мисливець за скарбами
TreasureHunter70.desc:
NAME explored outer rim planets in hopes of finding rare treasures.
After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, HE was betrayed by HIS men. HECAP survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.
HECAP created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help HIM seek revenge.

PilotFan99.title: Фанат пілотування
PilotFan99.desc:
NAME's father was a starfighter pilot, and HE always idolized the old man.
From a young age, HE collected pilot memorabilia and studied pilot books, preparing to join the deep space navy and follow in HIS father's footsteps.

StarfighterPilot54.title: Пілот зоряного винищувача
StarfighterPilot54.desc:
After years of training and drilling, NAME finally became a starfighter pilot.
Hundreds of combat missions later, HE grew bored and started seeking newer thrills. HECAP joined a band of space pirates, which eagerly welcomed HIM because of HIS piloting skill.

MedicalHelper65.title: Медичний помічник
MedicalHelper65.desc:
NAME traveled between rim worlds with HIS family. NAME's mother, a renowned doctor, often delivered lectures from the hull of their retrofitted cargo/medical ship.
Sometimes, the family took on difficult long-term medical work with especially needy patients, and NAME helped where he could.

GangSoldier28.title: Солдат ватаги
GangSoldier28.desc:
Living for many years between three raider settlements, NAME persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.
HECAP eventually took control of a violent gang.

CountryChild62.title: Сільське дитя
CountryChild62.desc: NAME was raised up to fear God and love HIS country. HECAP was a genuine backwoods kid. HECAP always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

SpaceMarine80.title: Космодесантник
SpaceMarine80.desc:
NAME joined Interplanetary Marines to travel the stars fight for HIS planet. HECAP distinguished himself in several battles.
HISCAP experiences desensitized him to people around him, and his social skills degraded. But, he did learn how to fight.

RebelWriter82.title: Письменник-бунтар
RebelWriter82.desc: Early on, NAME developed a talent for writing. HECAP was soon writing a popular online journal - anonymously, to hide HIS age - on topics ranging from bioethics to political theory and xenosociology.

Adventurer17.title: Авантюрист
Adventurer17.desc:
NAME's thirst for adventure took HIM to many planets. HECAP visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in HIS quest to find novelty and excitement.
HECAP worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, HE hated cooking the most.

ExiledPrince89.title: Принц-вигнанець
ExiledPrince89.desc:
A member of a royal family, NAME was exiled for shaming HIS family.
Living in a foreign land, mostly alone, HE spent most of HIS time making huts and houses to live in. HECAP found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all his friends and family.

BloodyWanderer51.title: Кривавий мандрівник
BloodyWanderer51.desc:
NAME was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.
One day, he had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. HECAP eventually calmed, but HIS bloodlust never left HIM.

NewAgeDuelist36.title: Дуелянт нового віку
NewAgeDuelist36.desc:
NAME was fascinated with combat. HIS parents traveled often, so HE was able to sample many different fighting styles, from 76th-wave jujutsu to the infamous 'urbworld-style' karate.
A polite child, most fighters accepted HIS requests for training - but moving around often without finishing a tutelage made HIM lazy.

PirateDoctor33.title: Pirate doctor
PirateDoctor33.desc:
NAME had a passion for medicine, but never bothered to get a medical degree. Only underfunded pirates and terrorists were desperate enough to hire HIS services, and HIS surgical patients had about a 50% survival rate.
Despite this, HIS optimistic attitude drove HIM to keep trying to heal those in need. As long as they paid up front.

SpoiledBrat84.title: Spoiled brat
SpoiledBrat84.desc:
Born in a rich family, NAME was given everything, and never developed basic work ethic or the foundations of a non-dependent personality.
HECAP was expected to become one of the best doctors in the world.

BloodyDentist33.title: Bloody dentist
BloodyDentist33.desc:
After studying at a famous college, NAME's weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. HECAP went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under HIS care.
After a pursuit, HE managed to escape HIS planet and travel to a new world.

CowFarmer93.title: Корівник
CowFarmer93.desc:
NAME grew up on a rim world, under the tyranny of HIS father, who forced HIM to work every day on the farm. HE dreamed of escaping HIS father and exploring the universe.
One day, when the trade ship was overhead, HE stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

MasterChef6.title: Шеф-кухар
MasterChef6.desc:
On a glitterworld, NAME found a job washing dishes at a famous restaurant and worked HIS way up the ranks.
A few years later, HIS career came to an end when someone poisoned the meal HE was preparing for the mayor. Jobless, HE and left to explore the stars once again.

DiscardedYouth95.title: Покинута молодь
DiscardedYouth95.desc:
NAME grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, HE sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.
In these desperate circumstances, against all odds, HE survived - and thrived.

Mercenary19.title: Найманець
Mercenary19.desc:
After escaping his home planet, NAME fell in with a band of mercenaries. HECAP fought alongside his brothers and sisters in arms for many years.
One day, they were caught in a fight they couldn't win. Refusing to retreat, NAME was shot down by his enemies. HECAP was alarmed to awake in a heap of corpses, mysteriously unharmed.

DisasterSurvivor28.title: Переживший катастрофу
DisasterSurvivor28.desc: NAME's planet collided with a small moon. Everything he knew as home was destroyed, and his entire family died. HECAP was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

ExplorerWriter37.title: Дослідник-письменник
ExplorerWriter37.desc:
NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research.
HISCAP goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

RebelChild7.title: Повстанська дитина
RebelChild7.desc:
NAME was born under authoritarian rule. Despite intense oppression from family and community, she never gave up fighting for her dignity and her freedom.
She was often put into hopeless situations where even family would try to terrorize her into propriety. She learned to trust no one.

MilitiaSoldier83.title: Боєць ополчення
MilitiaSoldier83.desc:
NAME joined the militia forces and fought for rights and peace.
After her homeworld was unexpectedly destroyed in the wars, she traveled great distances, seeking a refuge where she could build a new, free way of life.

MidworldCadet20.title: Midworld cadet
MidworldCadet20.desc:
Growing up on a high-tech midworld with a flourishing space transit industry, NAME wished to leave for the stars and live among the growing spacer class.
HECAP excelled in HIS studies, and gained entry to HIS homeworld's most prestigious naval academy.

WarshipCaptain77.title: Капітан корабля
WarshipCaptain77.desc:
Years of being commanding officer of an advanced corvette taught NAME the art of leadership, the techniques of higher engineering, and how to stay calm while enemies try to kill you.
Unfortunately, NAME only very rarely had contact with nature.

VatgrownScientist41.title: Vatgrown scientist
VatgrownScientist41.desc:
NAME was grown to be a perfect scientist, with a mind perfectly tuned for physics and chemistry.
HISCAP creators used HIM as a teaching aid on mind design, hoping HE would eventually grow to be a great mind and continue their research.

RunawayDancer10.title: Танцюрист-втікач
RunawayDancer10.desc:
Grown by and for science, NAME gave it up. Instead, HECAP wanted to dance for crowds across many worlds, from the glamor of the glitterworlds to the dangers of the rim.
Such work required wearing a smile on HIS face and a pistol under HIS costume.

MusicIdol79.title: Музичний ідол
MusicIdol79.desc:
NAME was the only daughter of a powerful company president. HISCAP beautiful appearance led to a career as a music idol.
When HIS mother died, NAME could not bear HIS father's loneliness, and became his sexual companion.

ProstituteIdol99.title: Ідол повій
ProstituteIdol99.desc:
After HIS father was deposed, NAME's beauty led HIM to be forced into pornography to survive.
Over years of difficult treatments, HIS body was remodeled to appear temporarily ageless. Sold to an orbital brothel, HE became popular, with a steady stream of clients from all over the planet.

SicklyLiar18.title: Хворобливий брехун
SicklyLiar18.desc:
It is not uncommon for a sickly child to be cast away. What is uncommon is for that child to survive and even thrive with such a weak body.
Using his quick wit and silver tongue, Lynn was able to get out of almost any situation - most of the time at the cost others around him.

SicklyLawyer36.title: Некволий адвокат
SicklyLawyer36.desc:
As a lawyer, Lynn could convict a deaf man for stealing music. His sharp mind and lack of empathy let him say anything to get the other person to talk. With the right amount of money, he knew, any case can be won.
His childhood cough never went away.

IceworldSurvivor81.title: Уцілівший з крижаного краю
IceworldSurvivor81.desc:
NAME was born on an iceworld. Survival depended on staying together and building with nothing.
HECAP got used to the cold. HECAP never got used to dealing with those strange green things called plants.

Tinkerer86.title: Tinkerer
Tinkerer86.desc:
"Як це працює?
Чому воно рухається?
Можливо, якщо я підправлю це... упс, я сподіваюся, що стало краще... чи може я зламав його..."

TragicLoner16.title: Tragic loner
TragicLoner16.desc:
NAME was involved in a traumatic accident that resulted in HIM killing HIS own family.
Cast out from society, HE was left with only HIS animal companions and several engineering textbooks to keep HIM company.

RocketPioneer19.title: Rocket pioneer
RocketPioneer19.desc:
As a self-taught engineer, NAME escaped his dying homeworld on a rocket HE built HIMself.
HECAP later spent years of his life on several worlds, helping less-developed planets develop rocket technology.

AntisocialChild27.title: Асоціальний дитина
AntisocialChild27.desc:
NAME lacked typical social skills, and avoided social interaction.
HECAP gained satisfaction only from steady work. HECAP especially disliked speaking with overly creative or outgoing individuals.

ArmySergeant81.title: Сержант армії
ArmySergeant81.desc:
NAME served in HIS nation's military, commanding small units as a non-commissioned officer.
HECAP excelled creating tactically sound plans despite difficult circumstances.

YoungPirate59.title: Молодий пірат
YoungPirate59.desc:
NAME was born to pirates, in a dirty metal room that smelled of motor oil.
HECAP was never exactly taught anything, but HE still learned the ways of survival, barter, and combat.

StellarPirate14.title: Зоряний пірат
StellarPirate14.desc:
NAME was captain of a pirate ship. HECAP and his crew made their living capturing traders who wandered off-course.
HECAP was known for HIS balanced approach to problems, building, fighting, or negotiating as needed.

SoldierExperiment38.title: Soldier experiment
SoldierExperiment38.desc:
NAME grew up believing HE was a normal, albeit slightly sheltered child.
In truth, HE was part of an elaborate experiment. Researchers were conditioning HIM using social interactions and mechanite injections to try to produce an elite soldier.

LostSoldier35.title: Заблукалий солдат
LostSoldier35.desc:
NAME's childhood soldier conditioning failed, and the experiment was shut down. HECAP was abandoned, purposeless, friendless.
NAME eventually found solace in physically demanding work. HECAP especially liked building houses and crafting heavy armor.

DedicatedStudent61.title: Dedicated student
DedicatedStudent61.desc:
The child of a wealthy manufacturer, NAME was pampered from an early age. HECAP developed an affinity for reading and art, and a distaste for menial chores.
A revolution brought his father's businesses under state control. Penniless, NAME worked hard to complete HIS education.

LanguageAnalyst65.title: Мовний аналітик
LanguageAnalyst65.desc:
After war broke out on HIS homeworld, NAME was conscripted as a linguist. HECAP spent HIS days in a space station, decoding enemy communications and tending the hydroponic crops.
After a meteorite damaged the station, HE was forced to enter cryptosleep and hope for rescue.

Infantry36.title: Infantry
Infantry36.desc:
Lenka was raised on a world wracked by war.
At an early age, she was shown how to use guns and cruelty to project her will. She later distinguished herself by committing atrocities with more enthusiasm than anyone else.

PrisonerOfWar83.title: Військовополонений
PrisonerOfWar83.desc:
NAME was captured and put on death row for war crimes.
Fortunately for her, someone cut the power to her cell block. Riots ignited. Guards and trained wargs were deployed to quell the uprising. Organizing a few other inmates, NAME escaped in a small spacecraft.

AngryStudent39.title: Агресивний студент
AngryStudent39.desc:
NAME trained towards HIS dream of working for his hometown's local council.
For reasons he never quite understood, HE was bullied relentlessly by his classmates. HECAP chose to repress his rage.

MadAccountant34.title: Mad accountant
MadAccountant34.desc:
As an accountant, NAME often socialized with colleagues, and made many friends in upper management.
One day, NAME discovered a corruption racket run by some of HIS bosses. After reporting this, HE was fired. Wishing to hunt down those responsible, HE went on a mass murder spree.

TransferStudent80.title: Переведений студент
TransferStudent80.desc:
A midworld child, NAME's wealthy parents sent HIM to a nearby glitterworld to receive a better education.
NAME was a talented student. However, due to his family's wealth, HE never had to do dumb labor.

Politician92.title: Політик
Politician92.desc:
NAME was an activist in a powerful political faction. There HE learned the art of persuasion and speech.
HECAP had many enemies, so HE took secret courses in shooting and hand-to-hand combat.

DesertRat57.title: Пустельний щур
DesertRat57.desc:
NAME was born to a tribe of desert ascetics who wandered the endless wastes.
They sought a mythical substance they believed could liberate them from ignorance through psychedelic revelation - and usher in a new period of interstellar peace.

Philosopher62.title: Філософ
Philosopher62.desc:
NAME's thirst for archaeo-technological knowledge drove HIM to spend years surveying abandoned data centers and studying ancient coding languages.
HECAP claimed to be one of the few who could piece together the tragedy of the past - and offer a path to the future.

ArtisticWeirdo41.title: Креативний дивак
ArtisticWeirdo41.desc:
NAME grew up in a house near a bustling midworld metropolis.
HECAP was talented at art and creative work, but often acted strangely, and thus had few friends.

AdventurousWeirdo48.title: Дивак-авантюрист
AdventurousWeirdo48.desc:
A creative but strange individual, NAME dedicated his life to his twin passions of medieval world history and high technology.
HECAP was fascinated by the idea of becoming a 'skyknight' with glittering armor and a giant sword.

ApprenticeOracle81.title: Учень оракула
ApprenticeOracle81.desc:
NAME was chosen at an early age by the village elders to keep the sacred rituals of the Oracle.
An irrepressibly curious child, NAME caused a religious crisis for HIS tribe when HE accidentally flipped a switch to open the "tombs" of the Gods - cryptosleep caskets inhabited by some very confused ancestors.

CasketBuilder57.title: Casket builder
CasketBuilder57.desc:
NAME was fascinated with cryosleep, and spent HIS life learning about the mysterious technology.
Working as an assembler on a midworld, NAME built an experimental prototype casket from discarded parts. Unfortunately, while HE was searching for the final component, HIS home was leveled by a bomb.

JunkyardMechanic0.title: Junkyard mechanic
JunkyardMechanic0.desc:
Left for dead at a young age, NAME was rescued by an old man who ran an urbworld junkyard. The old man forced NAME to do dangerous, demanding work.
NAME became very familiar with machines, but HE grew up with almost no other experiences.

MilitaryOfficer12.title: Військовий офіцер
MilitaryOfficer12.desc:
Obsessed with interstellar travel, NAME left HIS desolate life behind to join a military academy in hopes of becoming a pilot.
HECAP was trained in advanced combat and survival skills. While HE excelled in HIS studies, NAME was a loner and never cared about HIS crewmates.

Empath28.title: Емпат
Empath28.desc:
NAME was an incredibly empathetic child, so much that HE was totally overwhelmed by simple social interactions. Once, HE stepped on a bug and felt so guilty HE cried for an hour.
NAME did try to use a gun one time, but it went very poorly, as the loud noise made HIM flinch uncontrollably.

FearfulChef79.title: Наляканий кухар
FearfulChef79.desc:
NAME was a excellent chef who worked in a high-end restaurant.
One day, HE left the stove on, and accidentally burned down the whole building. This event shook HIM so much that HE swore to never touch a stove again.

PetKeeper10.title: Власник домашніх тварин
PetKeeper10.desc:
NAME spent most of HIS childhood tending the animals HE had bought or rescued.
HECAP saw beauty in natural things more than fabricated objects, and chose the company of HIS animals over that of HIS peers.

Herpetologist38.title: Герпетолог
Herpetologist38.desc:
After a terrible mining accident, NAME set off into space in search of exotic new animal species.
HECAP hoped to leave HIS past behind and find long-lived companions. HECAP knew the pain of loss too well.

ShipChild6.title: Ship child
ShipChild6.desc:
NAME's family were space traders. One day, NAME's cryptosleep pod failed in transit. HECAP had to spend years awake on the ship as the other slept.
HECAP filled HIS days creating beautiful contraptions from the ship's cargo - but HE didn't learn a lot of basic planetary living skills.

ArtifactHunter88.title: Мисливець за артефактами
ArtifactHunter88.desc:
NAME впав у депресію і втратив інтерес до життя. HECAP подорожував по планетах, шукаючи психічні артефакти серед руїн механоїдів з надією, що вони вилікують його душевний біль.
Стійкий палець на спусковому гачку й ретельне планування зберегли NAME життя.

ChildResearcher33.title: Дитина-дослідник
ChildResearcher33.desc:
Страшенно розумна дитина, NAME був викрадений корпорацією з блискучого світу й змушений досліджувати технології по використанню анти-матерії у військових цілях.
HECAP поклявся більше нічого ніколи не винаходити.

Fugitive94.title: Утікач
Fugitive94.desc:
NAME повстав проти корпорації, на яку працював. HECAP не вдалось й довелось тікати.
HECAP завжди був у русі, завжди все лишав позаду. HECAP намагався знайти помічників для його справи, але це йому не вдавалось через низькі соціальні навички.

VidtubeStar2.title: Зірка Відтуба
VidtubeStar2.desc:
NAME робив відео для популярного відеохостингу Відтуб. HECAP знімав усе: від оглядів відеоігор до рецептів по приготуванню пасти.
HECAP набрав понад мільйон підписників.

GunDealer81.title: Торговець зброєю
GunDealer81.desc:
Name торгуються високотехнологічними вогнепальними зброями між ворогуючими фракціями.
З часом він став дуже кваліфікованим у проведенні демонстрацій продукту та переговорів про вигідні угоди.

AspiringPhysicist7.title: Перспективний фізик
AspiringPhysicist7.desc:
Будучи дочкою енжинера і лікаря, раннє життя NAME було інтелектуально насичене. Після візиту до фізичної лабораторії, вона вирішила, що буде квантовим фізиком.
Bitten by a camel, kicked off a horse, and chased by dogs, NAME developed a fear of animals.

DeepSpaceSurveor17.title: Геодезист глибокого космосу
DeepSpaceSurveor17.desc:
Name була космічним геодезистом. Вона досліджувала планети, які були найбільш придатними для колонізації.
Її експедиція зустріла вороже налаштованих аборигенів, в зелений колір пофарбовану космос-жінку й наслідувача грецьких богів. Переживши безліч перестрілок, вона навчилася конструювати елементарні токарні й рок-гармати, щоб відбиватися від ворогів.

Punk70.title: Панк
Punk70.desc: NAME провів усе дитинство продаючи несправжні цигарки для 15-літніх. Цигарки були начинені різною скошеною травою.

GameDeveloper59.title: Розробник ігор
GameDeveloper59.desc:
Name був незалежним розробником відеоігор.
Після раннього успіху, кар'єра NAME швидко переросла в цирк помилкових ідей, справа пішла погано після невдалих піар-рішень.
